sentences.english: The city was bombarded with enemy shells for a whole day.
sentences.chinese: 该城被敌人炮火轰击了整整一天。

sentences.english: Can understand the meaning of bombardment degassing , we know why.
sentences.chinese: 只要明白轰击去气的含义，我们就知道为什么了。

sentences.english: Let's see you avoid a blast from my Synchro Cannon.
sentences.chinese: 让我看看你们能不能逃过我的同步炮的轰击。

sentences.english: Enemy fire battered the walls of the fort.
sentences.chinese: 敌人炮火轰击城堡的围墙。

sentences.english: It is unfavorable to study MS of aminoglycosides using electron impact ionization.
sentences.chinese: 使用电子轰击离子化方法研究氨基糖甙类是不理想的。

sentences.english: The mechanism of negative-ion-sulfurizing was also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文还对负离子轰击渗硫的机理进行了探讨。

sentences.english: Density of fire increases proportionably to the curiousness of the target.
sentences.chinese: 火力的密度与轰击目标的谨慎度成正比。

sentences.english: They heard the guns blasting away all night.
sentences.chinese: 他们听见枪炮整夜连续轰击。

sentences.english: The little town was bombarded with enemy shells for a whole week.
sentences.chinese: 这个小城被敌人的炮火轰击了整整一个星期。

sentences.english: Bushman also had the students blast each other with loud noises.
sentences.chinese: 布什曼也让学生们用强噪音轰击彼此。

sentences.english: It thundered at the town, and thundered at the cliffs, and brought the coast down, madly .
sentences.chinese: 它大声恐吓城市，轰击悬崖，而且疯狂地打坏堤岸。
利维森博士称这是一个双重反轰击防御系统。

sentences.english: In x-ray crystallography, crystals of protein are bombarded with intense x-ray beams.
sentences.chinese: 在X射线结晶中用强脉冲X射线束轰击蛋白晶体。

sentences.english: Heavy guns have to be bedded in before they will fire accurately.
sentences.chinese: 大炮必须事先固定炮位，方能准确轰击目标。

sentences.english: The laser caused the atoms to generate bursts of gold plasmons.
sentences.chinese: 激光轰击材料产生金原子等离子体。
高射炮火像雹子般轰击飞机。

definition: to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
